cv.title: Curriculum Vitae
cv.1.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
cv.job.1.title: Engineering Manager
cv.job.2.title: Tech Lead
cv.job.2.description.1: - Managed Front End (ReactJS), Mobile (React Native) and Backend (Java) flows for our domain
cv.job.2.description.2: - Improved GDPR Compliancy for member data and account access
cv.job.2.description.3: - Migrated core account access flows from legacy PHP to ReactJS
cv.job.2.description.4: - Managed core member backend microservices in Java Spring Boot
cv.job.2.description.5: - Designed event driven dashboard personalisation functionality
cv.job.2.description.6: - Designed and implemented MFA to protect member accounts
cv.job.3.title: Software Engineer
cv.job.3.description.1: - Developed the Identity Services for Customers, Colleagues and 3rd Parties
cv.job.3.description.2: - Designed and implemented the Clubcard Rollout to 100m Customers with a focus on customer identity and authentication
cv.job.3.description.3: - Improved CICD processes with Kubernetes, Helm and Jenkins in AWS of backend microservices
cv.job.3.description.4: - Created automated pipelines using ansible to deploy and manage MongoDB clusters
cv.job.3.description.5: - Created an internal system to manage AWS infrastructure integrations with in-house data centres
cv.job.3.description.6: - Created a POC native app and backend service for a colleague paging system for use in store
cv.job.3.description.7: - Worked in the graduate recruitment team to help create a better technology recruitment process and mentored junior engineers
cv.job.3.description.8: - Worked in India for 3 months to project manage and help QA
cv.job.3.description.9: - Managed and implemented a project working with a 3rd party hardware company to implement a new time keeping process in warehouses
cv.job.4.title: PHP Developer
cv.job.4.description.1: Time over the summer between my Industrial placement and University was spent developing an internal system to:
cv.job.4.description.2: - Aid the sales team at Opus to create quotes faster and more efficiently for off-site staff.
cv.job.4.description.3: - Generate PDF invoices which can be emailed to the customer.
cv.job.4.description.5: - Generate reports of users' sales statistics for themselves and managers.
cv.job.5.title: IT Finance Intern
cv.job.5.description.1: University placement. Working with Oracle Financials, Essbase, Hyperion Financial Reporting and ASP.NET development
cv.job.6.title: Web Programmer
cv.job.6.description.1: Time over the summer between my Industrial placement and University was spent developing an internal system to:
cv.job.6.description.2: - Aid the sales team at Opus to create quotes faster and more efficiently for off-site staff.
cv.job.6.description.3: - Generate PDF invoices which can be emailed to the customer.
cv.job.6.description.5: - Generate reports of users' sales statistics for themselves and managers.
